Text: Why anybody would ever waste their time to rar a 160mb MKV file is beyond me, but whatever.

@fall1en
It only shows how little you know about torrent technology. The whole point to it, si that you do not have to rar things anymore. Program itself downloads in small chunks, so when you rar something for a torrent all you do is make someone else wait for it to unrar and watch the progress bar. Learn more before passing judgement.

While I'd rather have the whole file instead of RAR'ed, this is hardly something to whine about.

This stuff is brought to you for free and you're whining because it's not super ideal. Geez.
